```{r read-from-csv}
library(tidyverse)

url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Yedzinovich/Data-607/main/project_1.csv"
flight_info <- read_csv(url)



# Gather the data into long format
flight_info <- flight_info %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "Airline_Status") %>%
  separate(Airline_Status, into = c("Airline", "Status"), sep = " ")

# Gather the city columns into key-value pairs
tidy_flight_info <- flight_info %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = -c(Airline, Status), names_to = "City", values_to = "count")



# View the tidy data
head(tidy_data)


```
